title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 139.7 - Assembly of regulated articles for inspection
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 139.7 - Assembly of regulated articles for inspection

State Regulations
(a) Persons intending to move intrastate any
of the articles covered by these regulations shall make application for
certification as far in advance as possible, and will be required to prepare
and assemble materials at such points and in such manner as the inspector shall
designate, so that thorough inspection may be made or approved treatments
applied. Articles to be inspected as a basis for certification must be free
from matter which makes inspection impracticable. (b) The New York State Department of

Agriculture will not be responsible for any cost incident to inspection, treatment, or certification other than the services of the inspector. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
139.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
